answers.answer: Hi,Prolonged erection could be due to use of drugs like sedanafil or antidepressants, certain medical conditions like diabetes, sickle cell disease, thalasemia major and priapism etc. Priapism is an uncommon condition that causes a prolonged and often painful erection, which occurs without sexual stimulation.I would suggest that you encourage your partner to visit a urologist and discuss the above mentioned possibilities and follow his advise.Best.

question: Hi, my boyfriend stayed at mine the other night and he got an erection but it didn't go away... He had 'it' and after we woke up it was still there so he tried a cold shower, ice on it... we thought maybe if he came it would help but it didn't. We walked around for an hour or so which helped it some-what but he had an erection for around 11hours. That can't be right. What should he do next time?
title: prolonged erections
